data.name: WiMAXUpdatesAreBeingDownloaded
data.value: WiMAX updates are being downloaded. {0} for status.

data.name: Dashboard_HardwareRadioOff
data.value: The hardware radio switch is off. To connect, turn on the hardware radio switch. Click Help for more information.

data.name: ActiveRoutesPopup_WiMAXOn
data.value:
There are currently other active network connections (e.g. - Ethernet) that may prevent WiMAX from being successfully activated on your computer. Please disconnect these network connections before clicking Yes below. {0} for more information.
Do you want to turn on WiMAX?

data.name: Prompt_ConfirmDisconnectDuringFUMODownload
data.value:
WiMAX updates are currently being downloaded. If you disconnect, the download will be stopped.
Do you want to disconnect from {0}?

data.name: Prompt_WiMAXConnectionWillBeBroken
data.value:
WiFi and WiMAX cannot operate at the same time. Turning on WiFi will disconnect WiMAX.
Do you want to turn on WiFi?

data.name: Prompt_ConfirmRadioOffDuringFUMODownload
data.value:
WiMAX updates are currently being downloaded. If you turn off WiMAX, the download will be stopped.
Do you want to turn off WiMAX?

data.value:
{0} is not available to connect.

data.value: The search is in progress. No networks have been found yet.

data.name: Dashboard_SoftwareRadioOff
data.value: WiMAX is off. To connect, turn on WiMAX.

data.name: DualModeWarningForWiFi
data.value: WiFi and WiMAX are both on. This may negatively impact your computer's wireless internet access speed and reliability. To avoid this, you should turn off WiMAX when not in use. For instructions on how to turn off WiMAX, {0}.

data.name: Dashboard_ConnectingToXLongOperation
data.value: Still attempting to connect to {0}. Please be patient...

data.name: DashboardExpanded_NoPreferredProfile_NetworksAvail
data.value: Select a network from the list and click 'Connect'.

data.name: Prompt_ConnectToUnknownNetworkWarning
data.value:
This network is unidentified and may not operate properly with the WiMAX installation on this computer.
Do you want to connect anyway?

data.name: Dashboard_BlockedForScan_NetworksAvail

data.name: DashboardExpanded_NoPreferredProfile_NoNetworksAvail
data.value: Click 'Search for Networks' to search for available WiMAX networks.

data.name: DashboardExpanded_PreferredProfileNotAvailable
data.value:

data.name: Prompt_WiFiDeviceConnectionWillBeBroken_Ver2
data.value:
WiFi and WiMAX cannot operate at the same time. Turning on WiMAX will disconnect all WiFi devices connected to your computer and turn off WiFi. You can always turn WiFi back on from this application's WiFi menu. {0} for more information.
Do you want to turn on WiMAX?

data.name: Dashboard_NotPrimaryCU
data.value: Another application is currently managing WiMAX connections. Click Help for more information.

data.name: APDO_PromptUserPackageInstall
data.value:
The WiMAX updates have been downloaded. These updates are critical for the normal operation of WiMAX.
Do you want to install the updates now?

data.value: Select a network from the list and click 'Connect'.

data.name: Prompt_WiFiConnectionWillBeBroken_Ver2
data.value:
WiFi and WiMAX cannot operate at the same time. Turning on WiMAX will disconnect and turn off WiFi. You can always turn WiFi back on from this application's WiFi menu. {0} for more information.
Do you want to turn on WiMAX?
